com.microsoft.live

Class LiveConnectClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.live.LiveConnectClient

  • public class LiveConnectClient
extends java.lang.Object
    LiveConnectClient is a class that is responsible for making requests over to the Live Connect REST API. In order to perform requests, a LiveConnectSession is required. A LiveConnectSession can be created from a LiveAuthClient. LiveConnectClient provides methods to perform both synchronous and asynchronous calls on the Live Connect REST API. A synchronous method's corresponding asynchronous method is suffixed with "Async" (e.g., the synchronous method, get, has a corresponding asynchronous method called, getAsync). Asynchronous methods require a call back listener that will be called back on the main/UI thread on completion, error, or progress.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      LiveConnectClient(LiveConnectSession session)
      Constructs a new LiveConnectClient instance and initializes it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LiveConnectClient

        public LiveConnectClient(LiveConnectSession session)
        Constructs a new LiveConnectClient instance and initializes it.
        Parameters:
        session - that will be used to authenticate calls over to the Live Connect REST API.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if session is null or if session.getAccessToken() is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if session.getAccessToken() is empty.

    • Method Detail

      • copy

        public LiveOperation copy(java.lang.String path,
                          java.lang.String destination)
                   throws LiveOperationException
        Performs a synchronous HTTP COPY on the Live Connect REST API. A COPY duplicates a resource.
        Parameters:
        path - object_id of the resource to copy.
        destination - the folder_id where the resource will be copied to.
        Returns:
        The LiveOperation that contains the JSON result.
        Throws:
        LiveOperationException - if there is an error during the execution of the request.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the path or destination is empty or if the path is an absolute uri.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if either the path or destination parameters are null.

      • copyAsync

        public LiveOperation copyAsync(java.lang.String path,
                               java.lang.String destination,
                               LiveOperationListener listener)
        Performs an asynchronous HTTP COPY on the Live Connect REST API. A COPY duplicates a resource. LiveOperationListener.onComplete(LiveOperation) will be called on success. Otherwise, LiveOperationListener.onError(LiveOperationException, LiveOperation) will be called. Both of these methods will be called on the main/UI thread.
        Parameters:
        path - object_id of the resource to copy.
        destination - the folder_id where the resource will be copied to.
        listener - called on either completion or error during the copy request.
        Returns:
        the LiveOperation associated with the request.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the path or destination is empty or if the path is an absolute uri.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if either the path or destination parameters are null.

      • copyAsync

                               java.lang.String destination,
                               LiveOperationListener listener,
                               java.lang.Object userState)
        Performs an asynchronous HTTP COPY on the Live Connect REST API. A COPY duplicates a resource. LiveOperationListener.onComplete(LiveOperation) will be called on success. Otherwise, LiveOperationListener.onError(LiveOperationException, LiveOperation) will be called. Both of these methods will be called on the main/UI thread.
        Parameters:
        path - object_id of the resource to copy.
        destination - the folder_id where the resource will be copied to
        listener - called on either completion or error during the copy request.
        userState - arbitrary object that is used to determine the caller of the method.
        Returns:
        the LiveOperation associated with the request.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the path or destination is empty or if the path is an absolute uri.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if either the path or destination parameters are null.

      • download

        public LiveDownloadOperation download(java.lang.String path)
                               throws LiveOperationException
        Downloads a resource by performing a synchronous HTTP GET on the Live Connect REST API that returns the response as an InputStream.
        Parameters:
        path - object_id of the resource to download.
        Throws:
        LiveOperationException - if there is an error during the execution of the request.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the path is empty or an invalid uri.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the path is null.

      • downloadAsync

        public LiveDownloadOperation downloadAsync(java.lang.String path,
                                           LiveDownloadOperationListener listener)
        Downloads a resource by performing an asynchronous HTTP GET on the Live Connect REST API that returns the response as an InputStream. LiveDownloadOperationListener.onDownloadCompleted(LiveDownloadOperation) will be called on success. On any download progress LiveDownloadOperationListener.onDownloadProgress(int, int, LiveDownloadOperation) will be called. Otherwise on error, LiveDownloadOperationListener.onDownloadFailed(LiveOperationException, LiveDownloadOperation) will be called. All of these methods will be called on the main/UI thread.
        Parameters:
        path - object_id of the resource to download.
        listener - called on either completion or error during the download request.
        Returns:
        the LiveOperation associated with the request.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the path is empty or an invalid uri.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the path is null.

      • downloadAsync

        public LiveDownloadOperation downloadAsync(java.lang.String path,
                                           LiveDownloadOperationListener listener,
                                           java.lang.Object userState)
        Downloads a resource by performing an asynchronous HTTP GET on the Live Connect REST API that returns the response as an InputStream. LiveDownloadOperationListener.onDownloadCompleted(LiveDownloadOperation) will be called on success. On any download progress LiveDownloadOperationListener.onDownloadProgress(int, int, LiveDownloadOperation) will be called. Otherwise on error, LiveDownloadOperationListener.onDownloadFailed(LiveOperationException, LiveDownloadOperation) will be called. All of these methods will be called on the main/UI thread.
        Parameters:
        path - object_id of the resource to download.
        listener - called on either completion or error during the download request.
        userState - arbitrary object that is used to determine the caller of the method.
        Returns:
        the LiveOperation associated with the request.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the path is empty or an invalid uri.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the path is null.

        public LiveOperation get(java.lang.String path)
                  throws LiveOperationException
        Performs a synchronous HTTP GET on the Live Connect REST API. HTTP GET retrieves the representation of a resource.
        Parameters:
        path - object_id of the resource to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The LiveOperation that contains the JSON result.
        Throws:
        LiveOperationException - if there is an error during the execution of the request.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the path is empty or an absolute uri.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the path is null.

      • getAsync

        public LiveOperation getAsync(java.lang.String path,
                              LiveOperationListener listener)
        Performs an asynchronous HTTP GET on the Live Connect REST API. LiveOperationListener.onComplete(LiveOperation) will be called on success. Otherwise, LiveOperationListener.onError(LiveOperationException, LiveOperation) will be called. Both of these methods will be called on the main/UI thread.
        Parameters:
        path - of the resource to retrieve.
        listener - called on either completion or error during the get request.
        Returns:
        the LiveOperation associated with the request.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the path is empty or an absolute uri.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the path is null.

                              java.lang.Object userState)
        Performs an asynchronous HTTP PUT on the Live Connect REST API. A PUT updates a resource or if it does not exist, it creates a one. LiveOperationListener.onComplete(LiveOperation) will be called on success. Otherwise, LiveOperationListener.onError(LiveOperationException, LiveOperation) will be called. Both of these methods will be called on the main/UI thread.
        Parameters:
        path - of the put request.
        body - of the put request.
        listener - called on either completion or error during the put request.
        userState - arbitrary object that is used to determine the caller of the method.
        Returns:
        the LiveOperation associated with the request.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the path is empty or is an absolute uri.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if either the path or body parameters are null.

      • putAsync

        public LiveOperation putAsync(java.lang.String path,
                              java.lang.String body,
                              LiveOperationListener listener)
        Performs an asynchronous HTTP PUT on the Live Connect REST API. A PUT updates a resource or if it does not exist, it creates a one. LiveOperationListener.onComplete(LiveOperation) will be called on success. Otherwise, LiveOperationListener.onError(LiveOperationException, LiveOperation) will be called. Both of these methods will be called on the main/UI thread.
        Parameters:
        path - object_id of the put request.
        body - body of the put request.
        listener - called on either completion or error during the put request.
        Returns:
        the LiveOperation associated with the request.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the path is empty or is an absolute uri.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if either the path or body parameters are null.

      • upload

        public LiveOperation upload(java.lang.String path,
                            java.lang.String filename,
                            java.io.InputStream file)
                     throws LiveOperationException
        Uploads a resource by performing a synchronous HTTP PUT on the Live Connect REST API that returns the response as an InputStream. If a file with the same name exists the upload will fail.
        Parameters:
        path - location to upload to.
        filename - name of the new resource.
        file - contents of the upload.
        Returns:
        a LiveOperation that contains the JSON result.
        Throws:
        LiveOperationException - if there is an error during the execution of the request.

      • upload

        public LiveOperation upload(java.lang.String path,
                            java.lang.String filename,
                            java.io.InputStream file,
                            OverwriteOption overwrite)
                     throws LiveOperationException
        Uploads a resource by performing a synchronous HTTP PUT on the Live Connect REST API that returns the response as an InputStream.
        Parameters:
        path - location to upload to.
        filename - name of the new resource.
        file - contents of the upload.
        overwrite - specifies what to do when a file with the same name exists.
        Returns:
        a LiveOperation that contains the JSON result.
        Throws:
        LiveOperationException - if there is an error during the execution of the request.

      • uploadAsync

        public LiveOperation uploadAsync(java.lang.String path,
                                 java.lang.String filename,
                                 java.io.InputStream file,
                                 OverwriteOption overwrite,
                                 LiveUploadOperationListener listener,
                                 java.lang.Object userState)
        Uploads a resource by performing an asynchronous HTTP PUT on the Live Connect REST API that returns the response as an InputStream. LiveUploadOperationListener.onUploadCompleted(LiveOperation) will be called on success. LiveUploadOperationListener#onUploadProgress(int, int, LiveOperation) will be called on upload progress. Both of these methods will be called on the main/UI thread. Otherwise, {@link LiveUploadOperationListener#onUploadFailed(LiveOperationException, LiveOperation)} will be called. This method will NOT be called on the main/UI thread.
        Parameters:
        path - location to upload to.
        filename - name of the new resource.
        file - contents of the upload.
        overwrite - specifies what to do when a file with the same name exists.
        listener - called on completion, on progress, or on an error of the upload request.
        userState - arbitrary object that is used to determine the caller of the method.
        Returns:
        the LiveOperation associated with the request.

      • uploadAsync

        public LiveOperation uploadAsync(java.lang.String path,
                                 java.lang.String filename,
                                 java.io.InputStream input,
                                 LiveUploadOperationListener listener)
        Uploads a resource by performing an asynchronous HTTP PUT on the Live Connect REST API that returns the response as an InputStream. LiveUploadOperationListener.onUploadCompleted(LiveOperation) will be called on success. LiveUploadOperationListener#onUploadProgress(int, int, LiveOperation) will be called on upload progress. Both of these methods will be called on the main/UI thread. Otherwise, {@link LiveUploadOperationListener#onUploadFailed(LiveOperationException, LiveOperation)} will be called. This method will NOT be called on the main/UI thread. If a file with the same name exists the upload will fail.
        Parameters:
        path - location to upload to.
        filename - name of the new resource.
        input - contents of the upload.
        listener - called on completion, on progress, or on an error of the upload request.
        Returns:
        the LiveOperation associated with the request.
